name.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

recipient-country.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria operates using an allocation model. Countries are allocated pots of money, per disease for a three year period. In this case of Afghanistan, the actual available pot of money is 58,522,740 and the actual value date is Thursday, 10 October 2019 This amount covers the period 2020-2022. Data in the recipient-country-budget element has been formatted to adhear to the schema rules.
